items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bows sewn on crooked and not functional
items.body: Cute dress but the bows are not functional to where you can re-tie them and the were sewn on sideways instead of right side up. I ended up just removing them from the dress entirely. Other than that, dress worked out fine for family pictures Read more
items.author: Gaylon Hilyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Dress
items.body: Love this dress. Fitting is super flattering & stretchy. Good quality! Read more
items.author: Bailey Sheaves

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t fit well
items.body: Neckline is a little too high. Just doesn’t fit as pictured. Great customer service to help return. Read more
items.author: Alex

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fabric
items.body: Fabric felt like parachute fabric. Read more
items.author: ACB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: LOVE this dress and is great for maternity or post partum. Very flattering. True to size Read more
items.author: dtc5

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Off center sewing
items.body: All the bows are sewn off center and the collar is loose. I need to add a drawstring to the collar and move all the bows. Wouldn’t recommend. Read more
items.author: Cait

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Love this dress so much!! Perfect length and it photographed so beautiful! I wore this for family photos and it was perfect! Only thing is the bows need to be ironed but that’s the only issue!! Read more
items.author: Chris Tummillo

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not flattering
items.body: Not flattering on the waist. But good quality for the price Read more
items.author: Dana

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red a, Brown, Red B, Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
